sentences.en: a scheme to increase police manpower
Accordingly, to administer unemployment to must increase manpower capital investment.
sentences.cn: 因此, 要治理失业就必须增加人力资本投资.

sentences.en: Harvesting grain in the 19 th century required plenty of horsepower and manpower.
sentences.cn: 十九世纪时,收割谷物需要大量的畜力和人力.

sentences.en: Here, the rich of value prep above of manpower resource.
sentences.cn: 在这里, 人力资源的价值高于自然资源.

sentences.en: I doubt whether they really have sufficient manpower.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑他们是否真有足够的人力.

sentences.en: Most of our defense budget goes for conventional forces and manpower.
sentences.cn: 我们大部分的国防预算是用在常规力量和人员上面.

sentences.en: The movement of young men from the country to the cities leaves the farms short of manpower.
sentences.cn: 年青人离开农村进城使得农场人力缺乏.

sentences.en: The police are seriously short of manpower.
There's not enough qualified manpower to staff all the hospitals.
sentences.cn: 缺乏足够的合格人员充实各医院.

sentences.en: They assigned 30 per cent of their manpower to help the peasants.
sentences.cn: 他们派了30%的人力支援农民.

sentences.en: They drew the manpower from those people.
sentences.cn: 他们从那些人中召集劳动力.

sentences.en: This project tied up a great deal of manpower.
sentences.cn: 这项工程占用了大量人力.

sentences.en: We are faced with a shortage in manpower, not in raw material.
sentences.cn: 我们面临的问题是缺乏人力而不是缺乏原料.

sentences.en: We mustn't sit by while our neighbouring commune is short of manpower.
sentences.cn: 邻近的公社正缺少劳动力,我们可不能袖手旁观.

sentences.en: We were near the limit of German manpower.

words.tran_cn: 人力；人力资源；[劳经]劳动力

trans.tran_cn: 人力，劳动力，人力资源，人手
trans.tran_en: all the workers available for a particular kind of work
